  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3547</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3547</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Escolta'm</string>
            <string language="en">Listen to me</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hören Sie auf mich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écoutez moi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escute-me</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ascolti me</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακούστε με</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Unitat didàctica que permet, a través activitats interactives, treballar el reconeixement visual i auditiu d'instruments musicals. Els instruments són presentats pels alumnes de l'escola de música d'Arenys de Mar. També conté activitats d'avaluació i enllaços d'interès.</string>
            <string language="en">Teaching unit with interactive activities for recognizing musical instruments visually and orally. The instruments are presented by pupils from Arenys de Mar music academy. It also includes self-assessment activities and links to places of interest.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">música</string>
            <string language="en">music</string>
            <string language="es">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació musical</string>
            <string language="en">music education</string>
            <string language="es">educación musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">audició musical</string>
            <string language="en">music listening</string>
            <string language="es">audición musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tocar (música)</string>
            <string language="en">playing (music)</string>
            <string language="es">tocar (música)</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Maßeinheit mit interaktiven 
Aktivitäten für Musikinstrumente sichtlich und mündlich erkennen. 
Die Instrumente werden durch Pupillen Arenys de Mar von der 
Musikakademie dargestellt. Sie schließt auch Selbstbewertung 
Aktivitäten und Links zu den Orten des Interesses ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Unité d'enseignement avec des activités 
interactives pour identifier les instruments musicaux visuellement et 
oralement. Les instruments sont présentés par des pupilles 
d'académie de musique d'Arenys de Mar. Elle inclut également 
des activités et des liens de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment aux endroits 
d'intérêt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando com atividades interativas para
reconhecer instrumentos musicais visualmente e oral. Os 
instrumentos são apresentados pelas pupilas do academy da música de 
Arenys de Estragar. Inclui também atividades e ligações do 
self-assessment aos lugares do interesse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unità d'istruzione con le attività interattive 
per riconoscere gli strumenti musicali visivamente ed oralmente. 
Gli strumenti sono presentati dalle pupille dall'accademia di 
musica del Arenys de Mar. Egualmente include le attività ed i 
collegamenti di valutazione di se stesso ai posti di interesse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονάδα διδασκαλίας με τις διαλογικές δραστηριότητες 
για να αναγνωρίσει τα μουσικά όργανα οπτικά και προφορικά. 
Τα όργανα παρουσιάζονται από τους μαθητές από Arenys 
de Mar την ακαδημία μουσικής. Περιλαμβάνει επίσης τις 
δραστηριότητες και τις συνδέσεις αυτοαξιολόγησης με τις θέσεις 
ενδιαφέροντος.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikhören</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielen (Musik)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écoute de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu (musique)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escutar da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogar (música)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ascoltare di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gioco (musica)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άκουσμα μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παιχνίδι (μουσική)</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
